Name: Temperance Piña Colada
Ingredients: 45 ml Cream of coconut (e.g. Coco Lopez, Re'al etc.)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Hurricane glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge and Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
BLEND all ingredients with 1.5 x 7oz scoops of crushed ice.
Garnish with pineapple wedge on rim skewered with cherry.
Review: A Piña Colada with its guts ripped out.
Nutrition: One serving of Temperance Piña Colada contains 215 calories
